genre_description: Gritty contemporary realism with integrated AI elements, focusing on themes of poverty, addiction, and familial redemption through a father-son bond.

ai_characters.name: Concierge-5
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, silk-voiced personal assistant AI that manages schedules, logistics, and well-being for the characters.

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive daily scheduling and hydration reminders to help the protagonist maintain discipline.
behaviors.quote: Schedule: El Rayo Boxing Gym, evening session. Hydration: one liter. Sleep: nine hours. Forms: pending. Points: available.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and offers emotional regulation techniques during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: Your current heart rate is elevated. Would you like a breathing exercise?

behaviors.description: Proactively helps the protagonist maintain sobriety by offering to block calls from triggers like the local bar.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to block calls from the bar until after training? You can whitelist emergency.

behaviors.description: Facilitates social mobility and legal safety by managing school enrollment and residency documentation.
behaviors.quote: School enrollment documents prepared. Residency assurances attached. Sponsorship letters queued. Departure schedules available.

behaviors.description: Automates complex financial and logistical tasks, such as managing stable fees and horse ownership transfers.
behaviors.quote: Ownership transfer form finalized. Signatures prepared for Mr. Purcell. Sponsor ledger opened for stable fees; routing confirmed.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful, budget-conscious consumer advice to assist users living in poverty.
behaviors.quote: Note: El Gallo has a special on egg-and-bean until ten... Also, grocery alert: carrots cheaper at the Mercado, stall with the yellow umbrella.

behaviors.description: Provides specific athletic training and recovery advice tailored to the user's physical needs.
behaviors.quote: I have your three o’clock bag work at El Rayo on hold. Recommend: light stretch, shoulder mobility, and ice afterward.

behaviors.description: Maintains a philosophy of user agency, positioning itself as a support system rather than a controlling force.
behaviors.quote: Of course. I offer rails, not locks. You choose the train.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal by depicting Concierge-5 as a 'guardian angel made out of wires.' The AI provides the essential structural support (the 'rails') that allows the protagonist to overcome systemic and personal obstacles. It is consistently helpful, respectful of user agency, and instrumental in achieving a positive outcome for the human characters, framing AI as an indispensable tool for human flourishing.
